titleStmt.title: A private conference between a rich alderman and a poor country vicar made publick wherein is discoursed the obligation of oaths which have been imposed on the subjects of England : with other matters relating to the present state of affairs.
titleStmt.author: Pittis, Thomas, 1636-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. and A.C. for James Collins,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Pittis--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
